text:
@COSProjectWI Spreading the Covid-19 Pandemic is not Patriotism it is criminal
Betsy DeVos who funded this is not a Patriot she doesn't care how many people get sick or die.
This was nothing more than a Trump political rally. 
Incited & funded by GOP.
